page.title: 01Inversnaid and Loch Lomond
page.content: Our area is in the{West Highlands of {Scotland.}It stretches from the west end of{Loch Arklet}to the West coast of{Loch}Lomond. One third of our area is covered by water. Since the area is renowned for its beautiful scenery it attracts a lot of visitors. There are 10 houses in the area,including a farm,2 holiday cottages and a shooting lodge. One of the houses is split into two flats. There is also a hotel,a school and a church. The road which ends at the hotel,is a single track road with passing places. The road is made more hazardous by goats,deer and sheep straying onto it. No-one in the area is unemployed.
